PowerDistributionMetrics.description: This is the schema definition for the metrics of a power distribution component or unit, such as a floor power distribution unit (PDU) or switchgear.
PowerDistributionMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the metrics of a power distribution component or unit for a Redfish implementation.

title: #PowerDistributionMetrics.PowerDistributionMetrics
